00016 typedef struct _linear_sched {
00017         rampunit_method_callback_type   callback;               
00018         void                                                    *baton;                 
00019         void                                                    *max_clock;             // pointer to a Max clock instance
00020         float                                                   ramptime;               // in ms
00021         float                                                   granularity;    // in ms
00022         long                                                    numgrains;              // number of steps left to take in this ramp
00023         
00024         short                                                   numvalues;
00025         double                                                  *value_target;  
00026         double                                                  *value_current;
00027         double                                                  *value_start;   
00028         
00029         double                                                  value;                  // current value of the ramp in a normalized range
00030         double                                                  stepsize;               // size of the steps we need to take in the normalized range
00031         
00032         t_symbol                                                *functionName;  // FunctionLib stuff
00033         FunctionLib                                             *function;              // ...
00034 } t_linear_sched;
